HRA is accredited on the two different procurement accreditations schemes a construction acreditacion scheme are goods and services accreditations keep one of these accreditations schemes about the purpose of the agency accreditation scheme for construction is to manage risks and reduce cost overruns in the procurement process by establishing effective and efficient asset procurement practices in government
the scheme applies irrespective of the source of funding for the project
all procurement of goods and services within the capital what's environment is to be managed according to the processes and procedures outlined in these training modules

the goods and services accreditations scheme aims to ensure procurement capability is consistent across New South Wales government agencies
